summary: A TV repair man must care for the newborn triplets of his former hometown sweetheart, now a famous movie star, so her career will not suffer.
cast: Jerry Lewis|Marilyn Maxwell|Reginald Gardiner|Salvatore Baccaloni|Hans Conried|Isobel Elsom|James Gleason|Ida Moore|Gary Lewis|Hope Emerson|Alex Gerry|Mary Treen|Judy Franklin|Connie Stevens|George Sanders|Dorothy Abbott|Ted Allan|Joe Brooks|Nick Castle|Helen Chapman|Milton Charleston|Edith Clair|Marian Collier|Chester Conklin|Franklyn Farnum|Dominic Fidelibus|Mary Foran|Joe Gray|Len Hendry|Dickie Humphreys|Frank Jenks|Danny Lewis|Rudy Makoul|Hank Mann|Kathy Marlowe|Leon Martin|Ann McCrea|Barbara Pepper|'Snub' Pollard|Harry Ray|Ned Roberts|Michael Ross|Will Wright
keywords: two sisters|movie star|italian american family|partial remake|triplets
title: Yo soy el padre y la madre
